scripts.dev:check: npm run format && npm run lint && npm run type-check
scripts.build:clean: rm -rf dist webpack/templates && npm run build
scripts.refresh: sudo rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && rm -rf dist && npm install
scripts.s3:sync:videos: aws s3 sync public/videos/ s3://street-lawyer-services/videos/ --exclude '*.DS_Store' --content-type 'video/mp4' --content-disposition 'inline' --cache-control 'public, max-age=31536000, immutable'
scripts.s3:sync:images: aws s3 sync public/images/ s3://street-lawyer-services/images/ --exclude '*.DS_Store' --exclude '*.hash' --cache-control 'public, max-age=31536000, immutable'
scripts.s3:sync:assets: npm run s3:sync:videos && npm run s3:sync:images
scripts.s3:fix-js: aws s3 cp s3://street-lawyer-services/js/ s3://street-lawyer-services/js/ --recursive --metadata-directive REPLACE --content-type 'application/javascript' --cache-control 'public, max-age=31536000, immutable' --include '*.js' --exclude '*.map'
scripts.s3:fix-css: aws s3 cp s3://street-lawyer-services/styles/ s3://street-lawyer-services/styles/ --recursive --metadata-directive REPLACE --content-type 'text/css' --cache-control 'public, max-age=31536000, immutable'
scripts.s3:fix-fonts: aws s3 cp s3://street-lawyer-services/fonts/ s3://street-lawyer-services/fonts/ --recursive --metadata-directive REPLACE --content-type 'font/woff2' --cache-control 'public, max-age=31536000, immutable' --include '*.woff2' && aws s3 cp s3://street-lawyer-services/fonts/ s3://street-lawyer-services/fonts/ --recursive --metadata-directive REPLACE --content-type 'font/woff' --cache-control 'public, max-age=31536000, immutable' --include '*.woff'
scripts.s3:fix-cache: npm run s3:fix-js && npm run s3:fix-css && npm run s3:fix-fonts
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run s3:sync:build && npm run s3:fix-cache && npm run cloudfront:invalidate
scripts.deploy:dry: npm run build && echo 'Build complete. Run npm run deploy to upload.'
scripts.deploy:confirm: read -p 'Deploy to production? (y/N): ' REPLY && [[ $REPLY =~ ^[Yy]$ ]] && npm run deploy
scripts.deploy:with-assets: npm run build && npm run s3:sync:build && npm run s3:sync:assets && npm run s3:fix-cache && npm run cloudfront:invalidate
scripts.analyze:size: npm run build && npx webpack-bundle-analyzer dist/stats.json
